about_the_game:
Welcome to "Undead City," a pulse-pounding first-person shooter set in a world devastated by a global pandemic. Humanity's last stand unfolds in this action-packed FPS where you must navigate a post-apocalyptic city swarming with relentless zombies.

Key Features:

Intense Combat: Engage in heart-racing battles against hordes of undead. Use a variety of weapons and strategies to survive.
Challenging Missions: Take on missions that test your survival skills. From scavenging for supplies to defending critical points, every decision matters.
Dynamic Environment: Explore a detailed city environment that reacts to your actions. Use the surroundings to your advantage, setting traps and finding vantage points.
Early Access Experience: Join the development journey! Your feedback will help shape the future of "Undead City." Enjoy regular updates with new features, bug fixes, and improvements.
Community Driven: Connect with other survivors on our Steam Community page and share your experiences, tips, and feedback.

Join the Fight for Survival:
Can you withstand the waves of undead? "Undead City" challenges you to survive in a world where every moment is a battle for survival. Gear up, stay vigilant, and fight your way through the chaos.

Download now and become part of the "Undead City" community!

name: Undead City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i3 7th, AMD Ryzen 1xxx series
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th, AMD Ryzen 3xxx series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: "Undead City" is a pulse-pounding first-person shooter set in a world devastated by a global pandemic. Humanity's last stand unfolds in this action-packed FPS where you must navigate a post-apocalyptic city swarming with zombies.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian
*languages with full audio support
